#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long l1=0,l2=0,n,i,elem,res;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&elem);
        if(elem%2)
            l1++;
        else
            l2++;
    }
    res=l1-l2;
    if(res<0)
        res*=-1;
    printf("%lld",res);
    return 0;
}
